website_summaries.verdict: Customers love the durability and features like the blade clutch, but its weight may give those with "problem lawns" a bit of a workout.
pros: Roto-Stop blade system stops blades without restarting engine
NeXite mowing deck comes with a lifetime warranty
High marks for the blade clutch
A powerful and durable mowing option
cons: Some may find that the positioning of the throttle and speed controls make it difficult to adjust one without the other
Some buyers report problems with gas leaks

customer_reviews.title: Stay away they do not honor their warranty
customer_reviews.text: The clutch cable broke within the 1st 6 mowings with this lawn mower. I called Amazon and tool Max they guaranteed me that it was under warranty and told me exactly where to take it. I ended up with a $110 bill and both Amazon and Max tool have done absolutely nothing to help me. very very very disappointed I've called multiple times and no one has helped me at all. I spent 700 dollars on a honda mower and then 110.00 dollars to repair a cable. not fair !!!
customer_reviews.author: peatmoss

customer_reviews.title: ... as well made as our 18 year old mower like it. Does not mulch as well
customer_reviews.text: was not as well made as our 18 year old mower like it. Does not mulch as well. Was missing then finally quit running a couple months after receiving it. took it into Feldmans in Liberty Mo for repair under warranty, the serviceman tried giving all kinds of reason why it was not working, after a long time in the shop waiting for a part, was finally fixed under warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra J. Aragon

customer_reviews.title: Great mower!
customer_reviews.text: I love the ease of use. It cuts almost as good as my last Honda , but doesn’t use a key. The bag occasionally gets unhooked from one side of its cradle.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Banks

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: All Honda mowers r great this one has a great price to go along with it.
customer_reviews.author: ken stanphill

customer_reviews.title: Great mower for my wife Fits in her hands PERFECTLY
customer_reviews.text: Great mower for my wife Fits in her hands PERFECTLY
customer_reviews.author: JDUBB

customer_reviews.title: BEST MOWER EVER
customer_reviews.text: I have a 10 yrs old HRX; I just bought another when I heard they were being discontinued. The kicker is I got the new one cheaper than the old one, $600 in a close out sale (Smiling). This mower bags completely full, always; It NEVER clogs. Also, the HRX powers through deep grass dry or Wet! I'm 66 and have used most mowers on the market. They both start second pull cold first pull warm. The Snapper is Junk compared to the Honda HRX
customer_reviews.author: jack Sherwood

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed - Carburetor Problem after 1 year
customer_reviews.text: I am a devoted Honda buyer, whether that be cars or small engine devices. I've been disappointed here, however. After 1 yr. the mower is surging. I followed the right process in the fall putting it to bed. The Honda authorized dealer says surging is bad gas and Honda won't cover it. It was new gas in the mower. Ultimately I'll fix it myself, but I've never had a problem like this before. I have multiple houses with multiple mowers and none of the others acted like this and they used the same gas. I expect more from Honda.. Kyle Provo UT
customer_reviews.author: Kyle B. Larson

customer_reviews.title: Best mower you can buy... you will not be sorry.
customer_reviews.text: Just picked one up today. I have a 1/2 acre to cut and I always had clumping issues with my few year old Craftsman. I would never fill the bag. I bought this one because it has the blade stop, bigger motor, plastic desk, and the hydro-static drive. It is not cheap, but you won't find a better mower. Honda makes great small engines as well as great mowers. (Snow blowers too, have had one for 20 years) I went with Royal Purple oil after doing some research. I plan to keep this mower until I am too old to cut my grass myself.
customer_reviews.author: S. Sabo

customer_reviews.title: my best mower ever
customer_reviews.text: without a doubt the best mower i have ever owned.it is a true workhorse and in 7 years has never failed to start.i cut over 2 acres but now due to aging i have picked up a john deere riding mower to help me out.my only problem has been to restring the pullcord on 2 ocassions.i also love the way it cuts including getting after some very high grass without loss of power.i am a honda believer
customer_reviews.author: ronnie voss

customer_reviews.title: Awesome machine!
customer_reviews.text: Didnt want spend $2,000 on a Riding Lawn Mower so I bought the best Self Propelled one!
customer_reviews.author: ROMEPOWER

product_meta.title: Honda HRX217K4HYA HRX Series Lawn Mowers (Discontinued by Manufacturer)
product_meta.description: Powered by quick starting Honda GCV Auto Choke engine, HRX cruise control (Hydrostatic) transmission, Infinite speed-control with comfortable level between 0 to 4 MPH, Roto-Stop blade brake clutch lets you start/stop blades with engine running, Micro Cut twin blade system uses 4 cutting surfaces for ultra-fine clippings, Impact resistant Nexite deck does not dent, rust or corrode, 3-position folding handles allow easy storage, EPA and CARB compliant.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars29 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
